faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.powerOutageQ: What should I do during a power outage?
faq.powerOutageA: First, check if your neighbors have power. If they do, check your circuit breaker. If not, contact your utility company.
faq.inspectionQ: How often should electrical systems be inspected?
faq.inspectionA: Professional electrical inspections should be conducted every 3-5 years, or when purchasing a new property.
faq.plumbingInspectionQ: How often should I have my plumbing inspected?
faq.plumbingInspectionA: It's recommended to have a professional plumbing inspection every 2 years to catch potential issues early.
faq.waterLeakQ: What should I do if I have a major water leak?
faq.waterLeakA: Immediately shut off the main water valve to your home and call a professional plumber for emergency service.
